---
title: "SPP for TECH"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
TECH <- read_csv("TECH.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
tech <- ts(TECH[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
tech %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(tech))
```

```{r}
training_tech <- subset(tech, end=length(tech)-2)
test_tech <- subset(tech, start=length(tech)-1)
fc_training_tech<-forecast(training_tech)
fc_training_tech %>%
  forecast(h=5) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_tech)
```

```{r}
fc_training_tech
```

```{r}
fc_tech<-forecast(tech)
fc_tech %>%
forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_tech
```
